an8.119:1.1: “For insight into greed, eight things should be developed.
an8.119:1.3: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
an8.119:1.4: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.119:1.5: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly. …
an8.119:1.6: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly. …
an8.119:1.7: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly. …
an8.119:1.8: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, blue, with blue color, blue hue, and blue tint. …
an8.119:1.11: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, white, with white color, white hue, and white tint.
an8.119:1.12: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.119:1.13: For insight into greed, these eight things should be developed.”
